p: The DEGs were identified between LMP tumors and EOC in GEO database by the Bioconductor package limma [ 9]. We set the |log 2FC| > 1.0 and adjusted P < 0.05 for cutoff criteria. Then, the Venny online tool ( https://bioinfogp.cnb.csic.es/tools/venny/) was applied to identify the overlapping DEGs among GSE9899, GSE57477 and GSE27651.
